title: Kona Bikes Bails on Sea Otter Classic With No Explanation
content:
Sources say that the CEO of Kent Outdoors, Kona's parent company, called the Kona employees told them to break down the display and not have a presence at the expo.

Read the full article at Kona Bikes Bails on Sea Otter Classic With No Explanation on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
